A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Commercialisation gone wild. Lack of direction\, poorly timed comedy and a confusing and weak plot.

No wonder so few real cinema visitors (not the film critics who's job it is to promote themselves through the act of licking the backsides of Hollywood) can tolerate this Disneyfied piece of garbage. 

Go and change the direction of some other Hollywood franchise\, Disney. Leave Star Wars to the real fans who don't require massive direction changes to be happy. Sometimes simpler is better.
